1: For the music director, of David, for a memorial.
2: O God, come quickly to deliver me, Adonai, to help me.
3: May they be put to shame and disgrace who seek my life. May they be turned back in humiliation who delight in my hurt.
4: May those who say, “Aha! Aha!” be turned away because of their shame.
5: But may all who seek You rejoice and be glad in You. May those who love Your salvation always say, “Let God be magnified.”
6: But I am poor and needy— God, come quickly to me. You are my help and my deliverer— Adonai, do not delay.
